content.html: #workingfromhome: I have larger monitors. I work later because I don't need to travel. I work while sick and contaminate no one. I'm more rested as no commute. I can concentrate. Productivity is better. Only some of these benefit me more than my employer.
content.value:
#workingfromhome:
I have larger monitors.
I work later because I don't need to travel.
I work while sick and contaminate no one.
I'm more rested as no commute.
I can concentrate.
Productivity is better.

Only some of these benefit me more than my employer.
